Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= small, flat tablet, ◄ probably made of wood or metal, ► on which words were scratched with a stylus (חֶרֶט)
= state in which an animate or inanimate object is relatively large in size
= action by which humans or deities mark letters, words or other symbols on a surface, such as clay, stone, skin, or papyrus, usually with a pointed stylus or reed
= short, sharp piece of iron; ► used for engraving marks, usually writing or drawing, on stone or metal; ≈ associated with conditions that are permanent and are not likely to change
= human being; ◄ created by God; ≈ often associated with weakness, fragility, and mortality

Node.chinese: 玛黑珥沙拉勒哈施罢斯
Node.definition: = man; ◄ son of prophet (נָבִיא) Isaiah (יְשַׁעְיָהוּ) ► whose name had a prophetic significance

Node.gloss: to call as witness|to have something witnessed
Node.definition: = causative action with which a person or deity calls on someone to give evidence or proof of something, either favorably or unfavorable
= action by which humans provide evidence or proof that something has taken place or that some decision has been made

Node.gloss: to be faithful|to be reliable|to be trustworthy|to be true
Node.definition: = state in which humans and deities are considered worthy of trust, because they are truthful and committed, with an unwavering disposition, which is reflected in their words and actions

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= man; ◄ tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► priest (כֹּהֵן) time of king Ahaz (אָחָז)
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= man; ◄ son of Jeberekiah (יְבֶרֶכְיָהוּ) ► time of prophet (נָבִיא) Isaiah (יְשַׁעְיָהוּ)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ◄ tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► father of the priest (כֹּהֵן) Zechariah (זְכַרְיָהוּ) time of prophet (נָבִיא) Isaiah (יְשַׁעְיָהוּ)
literally: to approach; hence: = action by which humans have sexual intercourse with others
= female person speaking on behalf of a deity
= process by which someone becomes pregnant
= process by which females among humans or animals give birth to offspring through the process of conception, pregnancy, and labor; ≈ sometimes associated with painful toil and anxiety
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
literally: to cry out (someone's) name (something); hence: = action by which humans assign a name to a person or place
= one or more words by which a person, deity, place or object is known, addressed, remembered, or referred to; ≈ regarded as a core element of one's identity

Node.chinese: 玛黑珥沙拉勒哈施罢斯
Node.definition: = man; ◄ son of prophet (נָבִיא) Isaiah (יְשַׁעְיָהוּ) ► whose name had a prophetic significance
= a marker pointing to the time preceding a particular point in time

Node.gloss: to know how|to be skilful at
Node.definition: literally: to know; hence: = state in which humans have the experience, skill, and expertise to carry out a particular activity
= action by which humans or deities speak with a loud voice, often to draw attention to themselves or to their situation and expecting someone to respond in one way or another
= direct male progenitor; ► who normally provides protection, care, instruction, and discipline; ≈ is usually regarded with respect and associated with wisdom, security, and comfort
= direct female progenitor; ≈ associated with affection and loyalty; often extended figuratively to refer to other objects that are regarded as feminine
literally: to cause to hold, carry; hence: = causative action by which humans take hold of objects and bring them to another location

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= objects that people possess in a relatively large quantity; ≈ greatly valued by the owner, strongly coveted by other people, and a cause of status
= town; ◄ in Syria (אֲרָם) ► capital of one of the Aramaean (אֲרָם) kingdoms

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= town; ◄ constructed by king Omri (עָמְרִי) ► capital of northern Israelite (יִשְׂרָאֵל) kingdom until it was conquered by Assyrians (אַשּׁוּר) ≈ often used metonymically to refer to the entire northern kingdom
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= nation; ◄ located in Northern Mesopotamia with Nineveh (נִינְוֵה) as its capital; regarded as descendants of Shem (שֵׁם)
= process by which an action is repeated or continued
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

= action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually not directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= a linker introducing a proposition denoting the reason for what precedes
= state in which humans or deities are unwilling to engage in any way with (other) humans or deities, or with other objects and events

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= pool in Jerusalem receiving water from the Gihon spring
= process by which liquids or other inanimate objects move from one place to another
= pertaining to being performed at a slow pace, without intensity

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= man; ► king of Syria (אֲרָם)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ► father of Pekah (פֶּקַח) king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
originally a plural construct with first person singular suffix of אָדֹון (אָדֹון) = way of addressing God as master and lord
= causative action by which humans or deities cause (other) humans or objects to go to a place that is situated at a higher elevation, by foot or carried by hand, or with the help of a vehicle

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= large body of flowing water ◄ located in Mesopotamia
= state in which humans or animals are numerous and therefore potentially powerful
= state in which objects or events are numerous in quantity or frequency

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= nation; ◄ located in Northern Mesopotamia with Nineveh (נִינְוֵה) as its capital; regarded as descendants of Shem (שֵׁם)

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= position of honor; ◄ often as a result of wealth and/or authority
= process by which a substance or other object appears to move up by itself
= river bed that contains water in the rainy season only; ≈ considered as deceptive as one never can never be entirely sure as to whether they contain water or not
= process by which liquids or other inanimate objects move from one place to another
= the land alongside a river
= process by which an object or substance passs through a certain location with strength

= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה) and, after the exile, a separate administrative district
particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y
= part of the body connecting the rump to the head; ► a ;place to wear ornaments, but also a yoke; ≈ a stiff neck is associated with insolence and pride
literally: to touch; hence: = process or action by which humans or substances arrive at a certain location
= process by which a bird or other flying creature extends its wings in order to fly
= part of body; ◄ of bird, insect, celestial creature; ► used for flying but also to give protection
= a certain quantity that fill a certain container

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

m.definition: = man; ◄ possibly son of Ahaz (אָחָז) or Isaiah (יְשַׁעְיָהוּ); ► whose birth was foretold by the prophet (נָבִיא) Isaiah (יְשַׁעְיָהוּ) as a sign to Ahaz (אָחָז) often taken as a reference of the Messiah (מָשִׁיחַ)
with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth

Node.definition: literally: to be broken; hence: = process by which the courage of humans is severely affected
= state in which humans have lost most of their political strength ◄ as a result of defeat and death; ≈ associated with loss of status and with ridicule
= to make an effort to hear the words spoken by someone else

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

= to tie a belt or girdle around one's waist; ≈ often used metaphorically to denote arming oneself for battle, or, in a more abstract sense, to put on certain characteristics and qualities, such as strength, courage, and aggression
= state in which humans have lost most of their political strength ◄ as a result of defeat and death; ≈ associated with loss of status and with ridicule

= to tie a belt or girdle around one's waist; ≈ often used metaphorically to denote arming oneself for battle, or, in a more abstract sense, to put on certain characteristics and qualities, such as strength, courage, and aggression
= state in which humans have lost most of their political strength ◄ as a result of defeat and death; ≈ associated with loss of status and with ridicule
= action by which two or more people or parties discuss the best way forward

= action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually not directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth

= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= state in which humans are strong in political sense|= state in which objects cannot be moved from a certain place
literally: hand; hence: = action by which humans or deities exert strength and power
= causative action by which deities use strong persuasion to cause humans to adhere to a prescribed action
= process by which humans or deities follow a certain pattern of behavior, ◄ which is described as their journey through life
literally: road; hence: = pattern of behavior, with a primary focus on moral and ethical behavior, ◄ understood as a journey through life

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= action by which humans devise a plan concerning other humans ► with the intention to harm that person

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= object or event inspiring fear

Node.gloss: to be afraid|to fear|to be in awe of|to revere
Node.definition: = state in which humans experience fear

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

literally: YHWH (or one of the other names of God of a combination thereof) of Hosts; hence: = epithet of God with focus on his being in charge of the host of heavenly beings surrounding his throne, praising him, and carrying out his will in earth; ≈ as an epithet it relates to God's power and control of the cosmos as the divine king and warrior

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= action by which humans acknowledge the holiness of God and certain times of the year that are important to him, and act accordingly
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= object or event inspiring fear
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= place that has been consecrated to a deity, where that deity is said to reside and is worshiped
= God ◄ described as a stone over which one may stumble, ► signifying that he will punish those who do not honor him

= a stone that is positioned in such a way that the foot of travellers may come in forcible contact it, ► which may result in stumbling and injury; ≈ usually used in a figurative way to denote sustaining any kind of hardship in life
figurative extension of a rock as place of refuge: = deity that protects and provides refuge
literally: stumbling block; hence: = a condition that causes humans not to live up to the expectations others have of them
= state in which a countable entity is two in number
literally: house; hence: = a group of people associated with a house, such as the family living there, or the descendants of the head of the household

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= contraption; ► used for catching animals; ≈ associated with aggression and control
= contraption; ► used for catching animals; ≈ associated with aggression and control
= process by which humans make a certain place or area their home
= town, formerly referred to as Salem (שָׁלֵם) and Jebus (יְבוּס) located on Mt. Zion (צִיֹּון) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► conquered by king David (דָּוִד) who made it the capital of his kingdom
literally: to stumble; hence: = process by which humans do not live up to the expectations others have of them
= state in which objects or events are numerous in quantity or frequency
= process by which humans or animals lose their balance while walking or standing and end up flat on the ground; ≈ associated with failure and loss of face
= causative action by which someone tries to gain control over someone else in an unjust way, ◄ as if that person were an animal caught in a net or trap
= action by which humans or animals take control of (other) humans, animals, towns or land, usually with violence
= causative action by which humans confine objects or masses to one single place by wrapping a piece of cloth or something similar tightly around it, ► in order to keep them safely in place
= to put a seal on a written document; ► in order to confirm that the document is authentic and to keep unauthorized readers from having access to it; ≈ associated with both authenticity and secrecy
= causative action by which humans or deities offer instruction to (other) humans, ► aimed to teach the recipients wisdom and good behavior
= person who receives instruction from someone else for a relatively long period

Node.gloss: to defer action|to wait|to lie in wait|to delay|to hesitate|to long
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities consciously remain in a particular state
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

literally: to hide (one's) face (from someone); hence: = action by which a deity does not engage with people, and does not intervene neither in their favor nor to punish, ◄ as if he were enable to see them
literally: house; hence: = a group of people associated with a house, such as the family living there, or the descendants of the head of the household

= man, also known as Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) ◄ second son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) ► one of the patriarchs of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) in poetic texts often used as a reference to the entire people of Israel

Node.gloss: to look for|to wait for|to hope for
Node.definition: = state in which humans experience a desire for something to happen, together with a degree of confidence that this desire will be fulfilled through the intervention of someone else; as a result, they are willing to defer taking action for some time
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse
= posterity of humans and or animals of undetermined sex, at an age ranging from before birth to adulthood
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= object or event that reminds of something that has happened or as a confirmation of something that is yet to happen
= object or event that reminds of something that has happened or as a confirmation of something that is yet to happen

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

literally: YHWH (or one of the other names of God of a combination thereof) of Hosts; hence: = epithet of God with focus on his being in charge of the host of heavenly beings surrounding his throne, praising him, and carrying out his will in earth; ≈ as an epithet it relates to God's power and control of the cosmos as the divine king and warrior
= a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a hill (גִּבְעָה)
= mountain; ► that part of Jerusalem (יְרוּשָׁלַ͏ִם) on which the temple was built, also known as a fortress and stronghold, city of David (דָּוִד) YHWH's dwelling place

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= action by which humans request information from a deity or other spiritual being, usually through the intermediary of a priest, prophet, or medium
= spirit of a dead person, ► consulted by fortune tellers; ≈ an activity forbidden in the law of Moses
= spirit of a dead person, ► consulted by fortune tellers; ≈ an activity forbidden in the law of Moses
= action by which birds, but also, in a derogatory way, to ghosts and mediums produce high pitched sounds

Node.gloss: to produce a sound|to growl|to mutter|to moan
Node.definition: = action by which living creatures produce inarticulate sounds
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= action by which humans request information from a deity or other spiritual being, usually through the intermediary of a priest, prophet, or medium

Node.gloss: for the sake of|for the benefit of
Node.definition: = relation denoting that someone performs a certain event for the benefit of someone or something else

= state in which humans and deities are alive and well, ◄ which, for humans, requires the presence of air to breathe and food to eat; ≈ life is regarded as more than a mere physical condition; in many cases it includes health, strength, and some degree of prosperity
= process by which humans or animals stop living, either spontaneously or as a result of an act of aggression
= causative action by which humans or deities offer instruction to (other) humans, ► aimed to teach the recipients wisdom and good behavior
= marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= a linker introducing a propostion that contains the content of what precedes

Node.gloss: there is not|it is not|it does not
Node.definition: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non existant
= process by which humans suffer hardship, possibly including physical pain
= condition of not having food to eat, often leading to weakness
= to be in a state of wanting or needing food, but having little to no access to food
= process by which humans respond in anger to a situation of personal physical pain and suffering

= actions by which humans or deities consign other humans or deities or inanimate objects to death, damage, or destruction, usually by invoking the name of a deity if the agent is human; ◄ this is done as punishment, out of contempt, fear, anger, or hostility, or because one was paid to do so; ► the effectiveness of a curse partially depends on the authority of the one pronouncing it
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something
= a process by which humans go through extremely difficult circumstances, resulting in severe anxiety, ◄ as if one were confined to a narrow and cramped space from which there is no escape

= state in which there is no light, ◄ caused by the fact that the light of sun, moon, and stars cannot reach the location that is in focus, ► resulting in a state in which no one can readily see, and colors and shapes can no longer be distinguished; ≈ associated with hardship, ignorance, and fear
literally: darkness; hence: = state of absence of joy and well being, ≈ commonly associated with darkness
= state in which humans experience distress
= state of total absence of light; ≈ associated with suffering and lack of wisdom

Node.gloss: to drive out|to cast out|to disperse
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans, animals, or deities cause (other) humans or animals to leave their place or position using force
literally: darkness; hence: = state of absence of joy and well being
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= state in which humans experience distress
= a shorter or longer moment in the passage of time
= state in which a countable entity is the first or the previous in a range

Node.gloss: to despise|to bring dishonor|to treat with contempt
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities expresses their contempt towards someone else, ► with the intention of provoking public shame in that person

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ tenth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and sixth son of Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ sixth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and second son of Bilhah (בִּלְהָה) slave of Rachel (רָחֵל) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= pertaining to being the latest in a chronological range of events, which may be situated in either past, present, or future
= causative action by which deities bring honor to people and areas

= an open space connecting different places, ► used for travelling and transportation; ≈ often extended to denote our life as a journey from birth to death, and the totality of our activities during our lives
literally: the sea; hence: = a large body of salt water located between Europe and Africa, west of Canaan/Israel
= river; ◄ flowing from Mount Hermon (חֶרְמֹון) in a southerly direction through the Sea of Galilee (כִּנֶּרֶת) into the Dead Sea (יָם־הַמֶּלַח)
= region, also called Galilee of the Nations (גֹּויִם) ◄ located in the northmost part of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)

= a large body of people united by common descent, religion, or language, inhabiting a particular state or territory, led by one common leader; often referring to the non Israelite nations, especially when used in plural|= region, usually simply called Galilee (גָּלִיל) ◄ located in the northernmost part of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
